screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 90,textsize[1] + 90) offset = 42 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 140 wsizex = textsize[0] + 140 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30,140) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 120,textsize[1] + 120) offset = 42 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 170 wsizex = textsize[0] + 170 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30,170) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() lenlist = len(self.list)*38 if (lenlist > 125): lenlist = 125
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 75, textsize[1] + 75) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = lenlist+15 wsizex = textsize[0] + 90 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (35, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 0), size = (55, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115, 0), size = (200, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (325, 0), size = (200, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (535, 0), size = (105, 35), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (35, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 0), size = (55, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115, 0), size = (200, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (325, 0), size = (200, 35), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (535, 0), size = (105, 35), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 26), gFont("Regular", 26)], "itemHeight": 45 }
